pr_title: [API-8] Reroute BlockSnapshot#empty into a factory, and add misc missing javadocs

timeline.bodyText:
Not sure "cannot be determined" is the appropriate phrasing.
Maybe state that the location is up to the implementation as to where "default" snapshots occur at.
As an example, In the mcp implementation, it would be 0, 0, 0 but Lantern could put it at Integer.MIN_VALUE.
timeline.author: Zidane

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/org/spongepowered/api/block/BlockSnapshot.java b/src/main/java/org/spongepowered/api/block/BlockSnapshot.java
index 14b129a53..8376ed2ef 100644
--- a/src/main/java/org/spongepowered/api/block/BlockSnapshot.java
+++ b/src/main/java/org/spongepowered/api/block/BlockSnapshot.java

@@ -213,7 +217,8 @@ static Builder builder() {
 
         /**
          * Represents a {@link BlockSnapshot} with the default state of
-         * {@link BlockTypes#AIR} and a {@link ServerLocation} that cannot be determined.
+         * {@link BlockTypes#AIR}, and a default {@link ServerLocation}
+         * that is decided by the implementation.
          *
          * @return An empty block snapshot
          */
